title: Standing on the Shoulders of Giants!

examples: And for that, analytical engineers are essential.
The results an analytical engineer generates would then help the designers to improve the wing’s performance.
Now, that is an analytical conclusion that former intelligence officials tell me is more of an opinion than a provable fact.
Now, that is an analytical conclusion that former intelligence officials tell me is more of an opinion than a provable fact.

Rather than build an entire airplane wing from scratch every time you want to test some of its features, an analytical engineer would use the toolkit of mathematics and physics to test its performance under hypothetical conditions.
words.defineEn: describing a method for understanding things through the use of logic and detailed thinking
words.defineVi: mô tả một phương pháp để hiểu mọi thứ thông qua việc sử dụng logic và tư duy chi tiết

examples: Who has a comparative advantage in cups?
They specialize in their comparative advantage.
In fact the entire collection can be used for comparative reasons.
She has a comparative advantage because her opportunity cost is lower.
Scientifically, Cuvier established modern comparative anatomy as a discipline, specializing in the study of elephants.
words.defineEn: relating to or based on or involving comparison
words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc dựa trên hoặc liên quan đến so sánh

examples: The names are much more descriptive and fun.
They're really descriptive, very expressive.
In US colleges professors used descriptive adjectives to assign value rather than relying on the numbers alone.
Sometimes, the product name sounds like another descriptive word that has a positive meaning.
So high-functioning is really more of a descriptive term and not really an official diagnosis.
words.defineEn: involving a description of something
words.defineVi: liên quan đến một mô tả của một cái gì đó

examples: Company executives cited a decline in tourism and a weak market overall.
The automaker cited the trade war as a potential risk to its business in China in its 2018 annual report.
The sponsors cited a lack of any prospect of meaningful progress.
Federal prosecutors cited insufficient evidence today.
An LSU review has cited miles' troubling treatment of female students.
words.defineEn: to refer to something as an example or proof
words.defineVi: để đề cập đến một cái gì đó như một ví dụ hoặc bằng chứng

examples: Doctors have classified over 150 diagnosable types, all with different potential causes, symptoms, and treatments.

The International Society for Bipolar Disorder taskforce classified the illness into three categories.
And some of the records are still classified.
The federal government still classifies it as a potentially dangerous drug with zero medical benefits.
words.defineEn: to put people or things in different categories or groups
words.defineVi: để đặt người hoặc những thứ trong các loại hoặc nhóm khác nhau

examples: They’ll be working in harness with other doctors to compile the report.
In recent years, various teams of astronomers have compiled a database of carbon-14 levels in ancient trees.
Several film enthusiasts have painstakingly compiled these scenes in online videos.
With the help of a humble slave, he also compiled the world's first phrase book of native languages.
So you can compile a bunch of different things.
words.defineEn: to gather information in order to produce a book, report, etc.
words.defineVi: để thu thập thông tin để sản xuất một cuốn sách, báo cáo, vv

examples: Her recent conduct is beyond the pale.
The court held that such conduct violated the statute.
I enjoy conducting experiments and making observations in science class.
Even though he came from a humble background, John's refined manners and impeccable conduct showed that it takes three generations to make a gentleman.
Before investing in a new business venture, it's important to conduct thorough research and assess potential risks.
words.defineEn: to direct or participate in the management of something
words.defineVi: để chỉ đạo hoặc tham gia vào việc quản lý của một cái gì đó

examples: The cooking show demonstrated the art of stuffing and rolling a pork fillet.
Jennifer started off on the right foot in her new job by arriving early, being well-prepared, and demonstrating a positive attitude.
Demonstrating how he dances well to whom fortune pipes.
The chef demonstrated how to core the bell peppers for stuffing with rice and vegetables.
In a criminal trial, the prosecution bears the burden of proof to demonstrate the guilt of the accused beyond a reasonable doubt.
words.defineEn: to show clearly that something is true or exists by providing proof or evidence
words.defineVi: để hiển thị rõ ràng rằng một cái gì đó là sự thật hoặc tồn tại bằng cách cung cấp bằng chứng hoặc bằng chứng

examples: The island derives its name from its Easter day discovery by the Dutch explorer Jacob Roggeveen in 1722.
Many English words were derived through metathesis.
They can derive information, like its mass and the shape of its orbit.
And we can derive a model for this gravitational potential energy.
Unfortunately, presidents don’t derive their powers from the sun, like Superman.
words.defineEn: reason by deduction; establish by deduction
words.defineVi: suy luận bằng suy diễn; thiết lập bằng cách khấu trừ

examples: The Geiger counter detected high levels of radiation in the vicinity of the radioactive material.
The rabbit's long ears help them detect sounds.
For once, Beatrice's eagle eye failed to detect the tenderness in Timothy whenever he spoke to Topaz.
Our cones detect fine detail and color.
Even now, satellites can still detect some very weak magnetism in patches of Mars’ surface.
words.defineEn: to notice or discover something that is difficult to find
words.defineVi: để ý hoặc khám phá một cái gì đó là khó khăn để tìm thấy

examples: A reporter obtained documents from the company under false pretenses.
The document was printed at the taxpayer's expense.
He presented a false document as evidence in the court case.
I always put my important documents in a safe deposit box at the bank because safe bind, safe find.

words.defineEn: to support an argument, claim, etc. using facts
words.defineVi: để hỗ trợ một lập luận, tuyên bố, vv sử dụng sự thật

examples: Estimates put the war's cost at £1 million a day.

words.defineEn: to guess the value, number, quantity, size, etc. of something without exact calculation
words.defineVi: để đoán giá trị, số lượng, số lượng, kích thước, vv của một cái gì đó mà không cần tính toán chính xác

examples: When the boss criticized the team's performance, one of the employees reminded him to sweep before his own door and evaluate his own leadership skills.

words.defineEn: to calculate the amount, importance, number, or value of something or someone
words.defineVi: để tính toán số lượng, tầm quan trọng, số lượng, hoặc giá trị của một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó

examples: I didn't mean to imply that you were in any way at fault.

words.defineEn: to suggest that one thing is the logical consequence of the other
words.defineVi: để gợi ý rằng một điều là hệ quả logic của khác

examples: This animal is sometimes interpreted as a mollusk.

words.defineEn: to explain what something means
words.defineVi: để giải thích những gì một cái gì đó có nghĩa là

examples: Earth Day is observed on April 22nd to promote environmental awareness.

She congratulated herself still more on observing in the course of days that Mr Verloc seemed to be taking kindly to Stevie's companionship.
words.defineEn: to carefully watch something in order to discover facts
words.defineVi: để cẩn thận xem một cái gì đó để khám phá sự thật

examples: The company has outlined a strategic plan with specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound objectives.

Now, the strategy outlines a whole-of-government approach to the problem.

words.defineEn: to give a brief description of something excluding the details
words.defineVi: để đưa ra một mô tả ngắn gọn về một cái gì đó loại trừ các chi tiết

examples: The survey aimed to gather feedback from both adults and children.

examples: And case studies contain a number of other worrisome effects.

examples: He is consulting his zodiacal chart to determine his compatibility with different signs.

words.defineVi: một thiết bị hoặc công cụ đòi hỏi kiến thức cụ thể về cách sử dụng

examples: But questionnaires are still subjective.

examples: The archbishop cautioned the cardinal to beware of a man of one book who bases all of his arguments solely on a single reference.

words.defineEn: a testing process conducted in order to decide on how effective, safe, etc. someone or something is

examples: The study yielded significant findings that could advance medical research.

examples: The laws were reformed root and branch.

examples: The parent modeled good behavior by always wearing a seatbelt in the car, even for short trips.

examples: Dees disliked all editors on principle, but he had to admit that this one at least gave credit where credit was due.

examples: The whole procedure is as easy as ABC.

words.defineEn: a particular set of actions conducted in a certain way
words.defineVi: một tập hợp các hành động cụ thể được thực hiện theo một cách nhất định

examples: In a criminal trial the standard of proof is beyond the reasonable doubt.
